# Fixture Sources

The following fixture cases were added from the libxslt test suite (GNOME/libxslt).

- case11: `tests/general/bug-24-.xml` + `tests/general/bug-24-.xsl`
- case12: `tests/exslt/common/node-set.8.xml` + `tests/exslt/common/node-set.8.xsl`
- case13: `tests/docbook/test/article.xml` + `tests/REC/article.xsl`
- case14: `tests/general/character.xml` + `tests/general/character.xsl`
- case15: `tests/XSLTMark/game.xml` + `tests/XSLTMark/game.xsl`

Source repository: `https://github.com/GNOME/libxslt`
